Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: reviews4
Reviews.Content: I moved into a new home and have a gate which needed a new key pad.  For the price, this key pad is great and it was easy to install.

ProductInfo.Features:
An upgraded version of the Linear AK-1
Universal wired keypad will work on any gate or garage door operator
Self-contained keyless entry system ideal for airports, hospitals, warehouses, office buildings
Up to 480 programmable input codes of one to six digits each
Two LED indicators show system status
ProductInfo.Name: Linear Access Control Digital Keypad, Outdoor
